intro: Gaze upon the horrors that dwell beyond the Wall of Insanity.
description:
Wall of Insanity 2 once again plunges us into a grim and perilous world, lurking beyond the veil of dimensions — a world of isolation and decay. It is a nightmare from which there is no waking. In this third-person action game, you will uncover the story of a lost squad while confronting an unspeakable horror.

During a police raid on the lair of a dangerous cult, the squad stumbles into a devil’s trap. Several officers who fought against the unknown are discovered unconscious and severely wounded—the rest vanish without a trace.
Now, trapped in a nightmarish reality, you are the last remaining fighter. Your mission: Fight your way back to our world and expose the horrifying threat lurking beyond the invisible Wall of Insanity.

Main features:

- Battles with monsters have become more active, and new dangerous enemies have appeared. But your arsenal has also expanded.
The game rewards caution, resource conservation, and competent use of the environment in battle. Properly selected tactics and weapons will save your life. Useful items will increase your chances of survival.

- An ominous other world, filled with various and worked out locations, with many secrets and secret routes. New destroyed and dynamic objects appeared. 

- The plot plays a significant role in the game. Immersive storytelling unfolds through compelling cutscenes, dialogue, and discovered diaries, revealing the tragic fate of the missing squad. Certain characters will unveil the hidden secrets of this world of visions.

- Multiple difficulty settings are available, each offering a distinctly different experience. You can adjust the challenge level at any time - simply choose the gameplay mode that best suits your style.
